com.netflix.genie.web.services

Interface AttachmentService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileSystemAttachmentService

    @Validated
public interface AttachmentService
    APIs for dealing with attachments sent in with Genie requests. Implementations will handle where to store them and how to retrieve them when requested.
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void copy(java.lang.String jobId, java.io.File destination)
      Deprecated. 
      Use copyAll(String, Path) instead
      void copyAll(java.lang.String id, java.nio.file.Path destination)
      Copy all attachments associated with the given id into the provided destination.
      void delete(java.lang.String jobId)
      Deprecated. 
      Use deleteAll(String) instead
      void deleteAll(java.lang.String id)
      Delete all the attachments that were associated with the given id.
      void deleteAttachments(java.lang.String jobId)
      Given the id of a job delete all the attachments that were saved for it.
      void save(java.lang.String jobId, java.lang.String filename, java.io.InputStream content)
      Deprecated. 
      Use saveAll(Map) instead
      java.lang.String saveAll(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.io.InputStream> attachments)
      Save all attachments for a given request.
      java.util.Set<java.net.URI> saveAttachments(java.lang.String jobId, java.util.Set<org.springframework.core.io.Resource> attachments)
      Given the id of a job and the set of attachments associated with that job this API should save the attachments somewhere that the agent can access as job dependencies once the job runs.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        @Deprecated
void save(java.lang.String jobId,
                      java.lang.String filename,
                      java.io.InputStream content)
               throws GenieException
        Deprecated. Use saveAll(Map) instead
        Save a given attachment for a job for later retrieval.
        Parameters:
        jobId - The id of the job to save the attachment for
        filename - The name of the attachment
        content - A stream to access the contents of the attachment
        Throws:
        GenieException - For any error during the save process

      • copy

        @Deprecated
void copy(java.lang.String jobId,
                      java.io.File destination)
               throws GenieException
        Deprecated. Use copyAll(String, Path) instead
        Copy all the attachments for a job into the specified directory.
        Parameters:
        jobId - The id of the job to get the attachments for.
        destination - The directory to copy the attachments into
        Throws:
        GenieException - For any error during the copy process

      • delete

        @Deprecated
void delete(java.lang.String jobId)
                 throws GenieException
        Deprecated. Use deleteAll(String) instead
        Delete the attachments for the given job.
        Parameters:
        jobId - The id of the job to delete the attachments for
        Throws:
        GenieException - For any error during the delete process

      • saveAll

        java.lang.String saveAll(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.io.InputStream> attachments)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Save all attachments for a given request.
        Parameters:
        attachments - The map of filename to contents for all attachments. All input streams will be closed after this method returns
        Returns:
        A unique identifier that can be used to reference the attachments later
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If unable to save any of the attachments

      • copyAll

        void copyAll(java.lang.String id,
             java.nio.file.Path destination)
      throws java.io.IOException
        Copy all attachments associated with the given id into the provided destination.
        Parameters:
        id - The id that was returned from the original call to saveAll(Map)
        destination - The destination where the attachments should be copied. Must be a directory if it already exists. If it doesn't exist it will be created.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the copy fails for any reason

      • deleteAll

        void deleteAll(java.lang.String id)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Delete all the attachments that were associated with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id that was returned from the original call to saveAll(Map)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On error during deletion

      • saveAttachments

        java.util.Set<java.net.URI> saveAttachments(java.lang.String jobId,
                                            java.util.Set<org.springframework.core.io.Resource> attachments)
                                     throws SaveAttachmentException
        Given the id of a job and the set of attachments associated with that job this API should save the attachments somewhere that the agent can access as job dependencies once the job runs.
        Parameters:
        jobId - The id of the job these attachments are for
        attachments - The attachments sent by the user
        Returns:
        The set of URI where the attachments were saved
        Throws:
        SaveAttachmentException - on error when an attachment is attempted to be saved to the underlying storage

      • deleteAttachments

        void deleteAttachments(java.lang.String jobId)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Given the id of a job delete all the attachments that were saved for it.
        Parameters:
        jobId - The id of the job to delete attachments for
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on error while deleting the attachments
